form.label: Historical Performance
form.description: Summary of key performance metrics by domain.

input.label: Domain/Host:
input.populatingSearch: | pivot Web_Performance rum count(rum) AS "Event Count" SPLITROW u_host

input.label: Operating System:
input.populatingSearch: | pivot Web_Performance rum count(rum) AS "Count of RUM Events" SPLITROW ua_raw.os.family AS "UA: OS Family" FILTER u_host is "*" SORT 100 ua_raw.os.family

input.label: Browser Family:
input.populatingSearch: | pivot Web_Performance rum count(rum) AS "Count of RUM Events" SPLITROW ua_raw.family AS "UA: Browser Family" FILTER u_host is "$uHost$" FILTER ua_raw.os.family is "$osFamily$" SORT 100 ua_raw.family

single.title: Avg. DNS Lookup
single.searchString: sourcetype="rum" "u_host"="*" "ua_raw.os.family"="*" "ua_raw.family"="*" | eval cur_dns=(nt_dns_end - nt_dns_st)*10 | stats avg(cur_dns) as cur_avg_dns | eval cur_avg_dns=round(cur_avg_dns,2) | rangemap field=cur_avg_dns low=0-10 elevated=11-30 default=severe

single.title: Avg. TTFB
single.searchString: sourcetype="rum" "u_host"="$uHost$" "ua_raw.os.family"="$osFamily$" "ua_raw.family"="$uaFamily$" | eval ttfb=t_resp/1000 | stats avg(ttfb) as "TTFB" | eval TTFB=round(TTFB,2) | rangemap field=TTFB low=0-4 elevated=5-9 default=severe

single.title: Avg. Page Ready
single.searchString: sourcetype="rum" "u_host"="$uHost$" "ua_raw.os.family"="$osFamily$" "ua_raw.family"="$uaFamily$" | eval ready=t_page/1000 | stats avg(ready) as "Ready" | eval Ready=round(Ready,2) | rangemap field=Ready low=0-4 elevated=5-9 default=severe

single.title: Avg. Page Load
single.searchString: sourcetype="rum" "u_host"="$uHost$" "ua_raw.os.family"="$osFamily$" "ua_raw.family"="$uaFamily$" | eval ready=t_done/1000 | stats avg(ready) as "Ready" | eval Ready=round(Ready,2) | rangemap field=Ready low=0-4 elevated=5-9 default=severe

chart.title: Key Performance Metrics ($metric$. seconds)
chart.searchString: sourcetype="rum" "ua_raw.os.family"=* | eval load= t_page/1000 | eval ready=t_done/1000 | eval ttfb=t_resp/1000 | eval dns=(nt_dns_end-nt_dns_st)/1000 | timechart avg(load),avg(ready),avg(ttfb),avg(dns),count | rename avg(dns) as "DNS", avg(ttfb) as "First Byte", avg(ready) as "Doc Complete", avg(load) as "Load Time", count as "Traffic"
